trans-unit.source: Django Integration
trans-unit.target: Django集成

trans-unit.source: Elasticsearch Log handler for the logging library
trans-unit.target: 日志库的Elasticsearch日志处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Feel free to use this as is or even better, feel free to fork and send your pull requests over.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自由使用它,甚至更好的是,你可以自由分叉并发送你的拉请求。

trans-unit.source: In some cases is quite useful to provide all the information available within the LogRecords as it contains things such as exception information, the method, file, log line where the log was generated. All this can be also done from logstash configuration, but it still requires to provide quite a lot of context to
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,提供所有在LogRecords中可用的信息是相当有用的,因为它包含了诸如异常信息、方法、文件、日志生成的日志行等。所有这一切也可以从logstash配置中完成,但它仍然需要提供相当多的上下文信息给

trans-unit.source: Initialisation parameters
trans-unit.target: 初始化参数

trans-unit.source: Install using pip:
trans-unit.target: 用pip安装。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: It is also very easy to integrate the handler to Django And what is even better, at DEBUG level django logs information such as how long it takes for DB connections to return so they can be plotted on Kibana, or the SQL statements that Django executed.
trans-unit.target: 将处理程序集成到Django也非常容易。更好的是，在DEBUG级别，django会记录信息，例如数据库连接返回需要多长时间，以便可以在Kibana上绘制它们，或Django执行的SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: Python Elasticsearch Log handler
trans-unit.target: Python Elasticsearch日志处理程序

trans-unit.source: Requirements Python 2
trans-unit.target: Python 2要求

trans-unit.source: Requirements Python 3
trans-unit.target: Python 3需求

trans-unit.source: The code above executes the DB operation, measures the time it took and logs an entry that contains in the message the time the operation took as string and for convenience, it creates another field called db_execution_time with a float that can be used to plot the time this operations are taking using Kibana on top of elasticsearch
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码执行DB操作,测量它所花费的时间,并记录一个条目,在消息中包含操作所花费的时间,作为字符串,为了方便,它创建了另一个名为db_execution_time的字段,其中有一个float,可以用来在elasticsearch之上使用Kibana绘制这个操作所花费的时间。

trans-unit.source: The code source is in github at https://github.com/cmanaha/python-elasticsearch-logger
trans-unit.target: 代码源位于github上的https://github.com/cmanaha/python-elasticsearch-logger

trans-unit.source: The constructors takes the following parameters:
trans-unit.target: 构造函数的参数如下。

trans-unit.source: There is more information about how Django logging works in the Django documentation
trans-unit.target: Django文档中提供了有关Django日志记录工作方式的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This additional fields will be applied to all logging fields and recorded in elasticsearch
trans-unit.target: 这个附加字段将应用于所有的记录字段,并记录在elasticsearch中。

trans-unit.source: This library provides an Elasticsearch logging appender compatible with the python standard logging library.
trans-unit.target: 该库提供了与python标准日志记录库兼容的Elasticsearch日志附加器。

trans-unit.source: This library requires the following dependencies
trans-unit.target: 这个库需要以下的依赖性

trans-unit.source: To create the package follow the standard python setup.py to compile. To test, just execute the python tests within the test folder
trans-unit.target: 按照标准的python setup.py来创建包,进行编译。要测试,只需在测试文件夹中执行python测试即可。

trans-unit.source: To initialise and create the handler, just add the handler to your logger as follow
trans-unit.target: 要初始化和创建处理程序,只需将处理程序添加到您的记录器中,如下所示

trans-unit.source: To log, use the regular commands from the logging library
trans-unit.target: 要记录日志,请使用日志库中的常规命令。

trans-unit.source: Using the handler in your program
trans-unit.target: 在你的程序中使用处理程序

trans-unit.source: Why using an appender rather than logstash or beats
trans-unit.target: 为什么使用appender而不是logstash或beats?

trans-unit.source: You can add fields upon initialisation, providing more data of the execution context
trans-unit.target: 你可以在初始化时添加字段,提供更多的执行上下文数据。

trans-unit.source: Your code can also dump additional extra fields on a per log basis that can be used to instrument operations. For example, when reading information from a database you could do something like:
trans-unit.target: 你的代码也可以在每个日志的基础上转储额外的字段,用于仪器操作。例如,当从数据库中读取信息时,你可以做这样的事情。

trans-unit.source: auth_details: When CMRESHandler.AuthType.BASIC_AUTH is used this argument must contain a tuple of string with the user and password that will be used to authenticate against the Elasticsearch servers, for example (‘User’,’Password’)
trans-unit.target: auth_details：使用CMRESHandler.AuthType.BASIC_AUTH时，此参数必须包含一个字符串元组以及用于对Elasticsearch服务器进行身份验证的用户名和密码，例如（'User'，'Password'）

trans-unit.source: auth_type: The authentication currently support CMRESHandler.AuthType = NO_AUTH, BASIC_AUTH, KERBEROS_AUTH
trans-unit.target: auth_type:当前支持的认证方式 CMRESHandler.AuthType=NO_AUTH,BASIC_AUTH,KERBEROS_AUTH。

trans-unit.source: aws_access_key: When
trans-unit.target: aws_access_key。当

trans-unit.source: aws_region: When
trans-unit.target: aws_region。当

trans-unit.source: aws_secret_key: When
trans-unit.target: aws_secret_key。当

trans-unit.source: buffer_size: An int, Once this size is reached on the internal buffer results are flushed into ES
trans-unit.target: buffer_size.一个int,一旦达到这个大小,内部缓冲区的结果就会被刷新到ES中。一个int,一旦内部缓冲区达到这个大小,结果就会被刷新到ES中。

trans-unit.source: elasticsearch
trans-unit.target: 弹性搜索

trans-unit.source: enum
trans-unit.target: 枚举

trans-unit.source: es_additional_fields: A dictionary with all the additional fields that you would like to add to the logs
trans-unit.target: es_additional_fields:一个字典,包含了所有你想添加到日志中的附加字段。

trans-unit.source: es_doc_type: A string with the name of the document type that will be used
trans-unit.target: es_doc_type。将使用的文件类型名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: es_index_name: A string with the prefix of the elasticsearch index that will be created. Note a date with YYYY.MM.dd,
trans-unit.target: es_index_name:一个字符串,包含将要创建的elasticsearch索引的前缀。注意日期为YYYY.MM.dd。

trans-unit.source: flush_frequency_in_sec: A float representing how often and when the buffer will be flushed
trans-unit.target: flush_frequency_in_sec:表示缓冲区刷新频率和时间的浮点数。

trans-unit.source: hosts: The list of hosts that elasticsearch clients will connect, multiple hosts are allowed, for example
trans-unit.target: hosts。elasticsearch客户端将连接的主机列表,允许多个主机,例如:

trans-unit.source: index_name_frequency: The frequency to use as part of the index naming. Currently supports CMRESHandler.IndexNameFrequency.DAILY, CMRESHandler.IndexNameFrequency.WEEKLY, CMRESHandler.IndexNameFrequency.MONTHLY, CMRESHandler.IndexNameFrequency.YEARLY by default the daily rotation is used
trans-unit.target: index_name_frequency:作为索引命名的一部分使用的频率。目前支持CMRESHandler.IndexNameFrequency.DAILY、CMRESHandler.IndexNameFrequency.WEEKLY、CMRESHandler.IndexNameFrequency.MONTHLY、CMRESHandler.IndexNameFrequency.YEARLY,默认使用日轮换。

trans-unit.source: is used this argument must contain the AWS key id of the the AWS IAM user
trans-unit.target: 这个参数必须包含AWS IAM用户的AWS key id。

trans-unit.source: is used this argument must contain the AWS region of the the AWS Elasticsearch servers, for example
trans-unit.target: 这个参数必须包含AWS区域的AWS Elasticsearch服务器,例如

trans-unit.source: is used this argument must contain the AWS secret key of the the AWS IAM user
trans-unit.target: 这个参数必须包含AWS IAM用户的AWS秘钥。

trans-unit.source: use_ssl: A boolean that defines if the communications should use SSL encrypted communication
trans-unit.target: use_ssl:定义通信是否应使用SSL加密通信的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: used by default
trans-unit.target: 默认使用

trans-unit.source: verify_ssl: A boolean that defines if the SSL certificates are validated or not
trans-unit.target: verify_ssl:定义SSL证书是否被验证的布尔值。
